body:
Betabuxx

Status and money are just about the best route to get a marriage if you are sub 5 (5 and 6 do ok but they still struggle a bit).

Of course being in that type of marriage is pointless (and can often times be very toxic) if there is no real attraction on her part.

Before you go, "What about all of the ugly men who are both ugly and poor and still get married?" Let me remind you that it absolutely can be very useful to have a personal servant that will do anything you want them to without fear of them leaving, while getting real sexual pleasure from the side outside of the marriage/relationship.

Another thing I predict you saying is NAWALT (not all women are like that). That's very true but if the woman has no physical attraction towards the guy and decides to get into a romantic relationship with him anyways these are usually the most likely results. 
 
The guy can get lucky but that's unfortunately how it usually goes.
